biography.value:
Most fire giants value not just strength but also skill at forgecraft. The foundry is the heart of any fire giant community. It is a temple, school, proving ground, and political hub rolled into one.

Those whose primary virtue is brawn are usually consigned to the lowliest of tasks, such as working forge bellows or moving coal. However, the strongest among these can excel at and gain rank through a specialized role: the dreadnought.

Dreadnoughts are massively powerful fire giants who wield two huge shields like plow blades. These shields bear spikes on their exterior and have hollow interiors into which the dreadnought pours hot coals at the first sign of danger. Armed with these two shields, the dreadnought can present a fiery wall to any attacker. When the dreadnought has finished, often all that is left of a foe is a smoking smear on the floor.

When not called on to fight, dreadnoughts maintain their strength by using their shields to shove huge quantities of coal, stone, or ore about the foundry. Occasionally, dreadnoughts are called on by their superiors to accompany a war or diplomatic delegation and use their fierce and intimidating demeanor to strengthen the delegation’s position.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

The &Reference[giant]{giant} makes two Fireshield or Rock attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=fire average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d6 type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The &Reference[giant]{giant} moves up to 30 feet in a straight &Reference[line]{line} and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature’s space during this move, that creature must succeed on a [[/save str 21 format=long]] or take [[/damage 8d6 + 8 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 4d6 type=fire average=true]] damage and be pushed up to 30 feet and knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Dual Shields. The &Reference[giant]{giant} carries two shields, which together give the &Reference[giant]{giant} +3 to its AC (accounted for above).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
